bug.summary: CVAT new UI: text attribute mapping

<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If we enter a text attribute in the object's menu it should display on the right panel too <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Text attributes don't display on the right panel with objects if we enter them using the object's menu. We have to save a progress and reload the link to see the entered attributes' meanings: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/88031770-bc445c00-cb45-11ea-9e61-7aee47ff9fd3.png></denchmark-link>
